alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Latah and north central Nez Perce Counties through 500 PM PDT... At 426 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kendrick, or 16 miles northwest of Orofino, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kendrick and Southwick. This includes U.S. Highway 12 in Idaho between mile markers 24 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewiston Area
